topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55177b5763687245be020000#post_55177b5763687245be020000
I doubt that. Jojo is in the same camp as One Piece. In that they're MASSIVELY successful without the Oda or Araki's editors having to do anything. So they let them do their thing. Aso Jojo doesn't run in Jump anymore. About halfway through Steel Ball Run, Araki switched publishers. Going from a weekly schedule to a more manageable monthly one.
